attributes.action: tighten controls on GP repeat prescriptions to eradicate addiction
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: GP`s continue to prescribe painkillers on a repeat prescription. This has ed to addiction. Dehydracodeine, diazepam, zimovane, temazepam, co dydramol to name a few. Tougher measures should be put in place to prevent abuse and addiction.
